alert.note: Alert for Saint John; Saint Thomas (Virgin Islands) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Juan (San Juan, Puerto Rico)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued November 05 at 10:20AM AST by NWS San Juan
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1215 PM AST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of Virgin Islands, including the following counties, Saint John and Saint Thomas. * WHEN...Until 1215 PM AST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Water over roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1020 AM AST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Up to 1 inch of rain has fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 2 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Charlotte Amalie West, St John, Anna`s Retreat, Charlotte Amalie East, Charlotte Amalie and Cruz Bay. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
